name: Employment characteristics of early career doctorate holders, by citizenship, ethnicity, race,  and position type: 2017
description: Employment characteristics of early career doctorate holders, by citizenship, ethnicity, race,  and position type: 2017

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_number_of_early_career_doctorate_holders
variableMeasured.description: Number Of Early Career Doctorate Holders

variableMeasured.name: field_percent_of_early_career_doctorate_holders_in_first_position
variableMeasured.description: Percent Of Early Career Doctorate Holders In First Position

variableMeasured.name: field_first_positiona_faculty_tenured_or_tenure_track_faculty
variableMeasured.description: First Positiona Faculty Tenured Or Tenure Track Faculty

variableMeasured.name: field_first_positiona_faculty_non_tenure_track_or_other_faculty
variableMeasured.description: First Positiona Faculty Non Tenure Track Or Other Faculty

variableMeasured.name: field_first_positiona_research_scientist_nonfaculty_researcher_or_other_position
variableMeasured.description: First Positiona Research Scientist Nonfaculty Researcher Or Other Position

notes: Counts are rounded to the nearest 100. Percentages are calculated from unrounded counts and rounded to the nearest 10th of a percent. Details may not add to totals because of rounding.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Early Career Doctorates Survey, 2017.
